DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Radiation therapy use high-energy x-rays damage tumor cell . Drugs use chemotherapy use different way stop tumor cell divide stop grow die . It yet know whether combine mitomycin porfiromycin radiation therapy effective treating patient head neck cancer . PURPOSE : Randomized phase III trial compare effectiveness radiation therapy plus either mitomycin porfiromycin treat patient head neck cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Radiation Therapy Chemotherapy Treating Patients With Head Neck Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Compare efficacy mitomycin vs. porfiromycin adjunct radiotherapy treatment epidermoid carcinoma head neck . OUTLINE : Randomized study . Arm I : Radiotherapy plus Single-Agent Chemotherapy . Irradiation involve head neck sit external-beam radiotherapy ( EBRT ) alone ( source specify ) , brachytherapy alone ( use permanent removable radiation source ) , ; plus Mitomycin , MITO , NSC-26980 . Arm II : Radiotherapy plus Single-Agent Chemotherapy . Radiotherapy Arm I ; plus Porfiromycin , NSC-56410 . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 200 patient enter 3-4 year .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Biopsyproven epidermoid carcinoma follow head neck site : Hypopharynx Oral cavity Larynx Oropharynx Nasopharynx Unknown primary origin positive head neck node TNM Stages IIV recurrent disease distant metastasis , i.e . : T1 N0 M0 T1 N13 M0 T24 N M0 T0 N13 M0 No carcinoma true vocal cord condition great 90 % probability cure PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : 20 80 Performance status : Not specify Hematopoietic : WBC least 3,000 Platelets least 100,000 Hct least 25 % Hepatic : Bilirubin le 1.5 mg/dl Renal : Creatinine le 2 mg/dl OR BUN le 40 mg/dl Other : No serious , lifethreatening illness No second malignancy within 5 year except nonmelanomatous skin cancer outside plan radiotherapy field PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : At least 3 year since chemotherapy No prior radiotherapy area current disease
